text: A flying squad led by Tahsildar Thirunavukarasu seized “unaccounted” cash of Rs.3.80 lakh from a cattle trader after intercepting a car near Tenkasi on Sunday night, sources said. The car with three persons was coming from Kollam to buy cattle at Tenkasi. The trader could not produce documents to claim the seized money, sources said.
title: Rs.3.80 lakh seized
